name: Obsidian Shield
description: Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for you and nearby allies that absorbs 1321 damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by 16% for 2.5 seconds.
coefDescription: Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for you and nearby allies that absorbs $1 damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by 16% for 2.5 seconds.
rawDescription:
Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for you and nearby allies that absorbs <<1>> damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.

You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by <<2>> for <<3>>.
